entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 01:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -18
Wind: WNW 51 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except locally 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 90 km/h gusting to 120 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
